Value: Peppermint Innovation Limited engages in the development and commercialization of mobile banking, payment, and remittance platform primarily in the Philippines. It operates Peppermint Platform, a white label mobile App banking platform and mobile App micro enterprise platform that offers payments, remittance, delivery and logistics, and ecommerce services. The company is headquartered in Perth, Australia.
Level 2 East 300 Murray Street Off Raine Lane
